select min(min_id), max(max_id) from (
  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_doc_discounts

  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_doc_laws
  UNION ALL
  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_doc_rates
  UNION ALL
  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_passports_dwelling
  UNION ALL
  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_passports_apartment
  UNION ALL
  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_houses
  UNION ALL
  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_infr_documents
  UNION ALL
  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_news
  UNION ALL
  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_organizations

  SELECT min(id) min_id, max(id) max_id FROM srchsm.search_people_events
  UNION ALL

) extr

select
  id,
  entity_uid,
  entity_title,
  entity_date,
  entity_text,
  entity_category,
  entity_type,
  ft_identifying_numbers,
  ft_location,
  ft_name,
  ft_description,
  ft_short_name,
  ft_tag,
  ft_text_files,
  entity_file_name,
  entity_location,
  entity_year,
  longitude,
  latitude,
  entity_ogrn,
  entity_inn,
  entity_deleted,
  entity_role_codes,
  entity_link
from
  (
select
  id                  id,
  file_guids          entity_uid,
  title               entity_title,
  round(extract(epoch from acceptance_date)::numeric)::varchar entity_date,
  doc_numbers         entity_text,
  'DISCOUNT_DOCUMENT' entity_category,
  '2'                 entity_type,
  doc_numbers         ft_identifying_numbers,
  place               ft_location,
  names               ft_name,
  ''                  ft_description,
  ''                  ft_short_name,
  ''                  ft_tag,
  converted_content   ft_text_files,
  file_name           entity_file_name,
  ''                  entity_location,
  ''                  entity_year,
  ''                  longitude,
  ''                  latitude,
  ''                  entity_ogrn,
  ''                  entity_inn,
  0                   entity_deleted,
  ''                  entity_role_codes,
  ''                  entity_link
FROM srchsm.search_doc_discounts
WHERE indexing_ready = true
      AND id >= $start AND id <= $end
 
UNION ALL

update srchsm.search_update_indexer set index_date = (select max(update_date) from srchsm.search_update_list_wa where object_type='WA' ) where object_type='A'
update srchsm.search_update_indexer set index_date = (select max(update_date) from srchsm.search_update_list_wb where object_type='WB' ) where object_type='B'
update srchsm.search_update_indexer set index_date = (select max(update_date) from srchsm.search_update_list_wt where object_type='WT' ) where object_type='T'
update srchsm.search_update_indexer set index_date = (select max(update_date) from srchsm.search_update_list_wh where object_type='WH' ) where object_type='H'
update srchsm.search_update_indexer set index_date = (select max(update_date) from srchsm.search_update_list_wo where object_type='WO' ) where object_type='O'
update srchsm.search_update_indexer set index_date = (select max(update_date) from srchsm.search_update_list_wv where object_type='WV' ) where object_type='V'
update srchsm.search_update_indexer set index_date = (select max(update_date) from srchsm.search_update_list_wk where object_type='WK' ) where object_type='ID'
update srchsm.search_update_indexer set index_date = (select max(update_date) from srchsm.search_update_list_wh where object_type='WN' ) where object_type='N'
update srchsm.search_update_indexer set merge_date = index_date where object_type IN ('S', 'Z', 'T', 'H', 'A', 'B', 'ID', 'N', 'O', 'V', 'L')
update srchsm.search_update_indexer set index_date = (select max(update_date) from srchsm.search_update_list_wk where object_type='WL' ) where object_type='L'

select min(min_ts), coalesce(max(max_ts), min(min_ts)) from (
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_ws l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'S' AND l.object_type = 'WS'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wz l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'Z' AND l.object_type = 'WZ'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wt l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'T' AND l.object_type = 'WT'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wh l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'H' AND l.object_type = 'WH'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wa l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'A' AND l.object_type = 'WA'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wb l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'B' AND l.object_type = 'WB'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wk l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'ID' AND l.object_type = 'WK'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wn l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'N' AND l.object_type = 'WN'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wo l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'O' AND l.object_type = 'WO'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wv l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'V' AND l.object_type = 'WV'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wl l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'L' AND l.object_type = 'WL'
) extrs

SELECT object_id FROM
(select object_id, object_type, update_date from (
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_ws
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wz
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wt
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wh
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wa
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wb
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wk
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wn
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wo
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wv
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wl
) ul) l,
    (select max(d.index_date) AS index_date, 'W' || d.object_type AS object_type from srchsm.search_update_indexer d group by d.object_type) i
    where l.object_type = i.object_type AND l.update_date <= i.index_date

(select object_id, object_type, update_date from (
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_ws
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wz
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wt
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wh
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wa
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wb
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wk
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wn
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wo
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wv
UNION ALL
SELECT object_id, object_type, update_date FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wl
) ul) l,
    (select max(d.index_date) AS index_date, 'W' || d.object_type AS object_type from srchsm.search_update_indexer d group by d.object_type) i
    where l.object_type = i.object_type AND l.update_date <= i.index_date

select min(min_ts), coalesce(max(max_ts), min(min_ts)) from (
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_ws l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'S' AND l.object_type = 'WS'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wz l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'Z' AND l.object_type = 'WZ'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wt l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'T' AND l.object_type = 'WT'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wh l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'H' AND l.object_type = 'WH'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wa l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'A' AND l.object_type = 'WA'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wb l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'B' AND l.object_type = 'WB'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wk l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'ID' AND l.object_type = 'WK'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wn l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'N' AND l.object_type = 'WN'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wo l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'O' AND l.object_type = 'WO'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wv l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'V' AND l.object_type = 'WV'
  UNION ALL
  SELECT
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM min(l.update_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000) min_ts,
    round(extract(EPOCH FROM max(d.index_date)) :: NUMERIC * 1000000)  max_ts
  FROM srchsm.search_update_list_wl l, srchsm.search_update_indexer d
  WHERE d.object_type = 'L' AND l.object_type = 'WL'
